info.name: Speedy Fruits
info.attribution:
The room design, library image, and other room elements are by Ingegneus and are released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The wood background by Nathan Dumlao is from-https://unsplash.com/photos/J2gEgTPM_OA and is available under the Unsplash license.

The deck back image by Michael Schwarzenberger is from https://pixabay.com/photos/playing-card-back-pattern-568200/ and is available under the Pixabay License.

The UI elements from the player menu are from-https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack-rpg-expansion and are in the public domain under CC0.
